original_text: but his disciples took him by night and let him down through an opening in the wall, lowering him in a basket.
korean_text: 그의 제자들이 밤에 사울을 광주리에 담아 성벽에서 달아 내리니라

sentences.original_text: but his disciples took him by night
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 제자들이 밤에 그를 붙들어

sentences.original_text: and let him down through an opening in the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성벽의 구멍을 통해 그를 내려보냈습니다
